/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the brick buildings that flank the road. The buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, add a touch of history and culture to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and architecture that is characteristic of Beijing.
